definition: to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Simultaneous to this engagement, Scipio had all his trumpeters blow at once to startle the elephants.
sentences.chinese: 同時，西庇阿命令所有號手一起鳴號來驚嚇戰象。
